name: FRP Bypass Workflow
description: Factory Reset Protection bypass for authorized devices only
authorization_prompt: This operation will attempt to bypass Factory Reset Protection. You must have proof of ownership and authorization to proceed.
legal_notice: WARNING: Bypassing FRP on devices you do not own is ILLEGAL. Use only on devices you own or have explicit written authorization to service.

steps.name: Verify FRP Status
steps.action: adb shell settings get secure android_id

steps.name: Require User Authorization
steps.prompt_text: Type 'I OWN THIS DEVICE' to confirm you have legal authorization

steps.name: Execute FRP Bypass
steps.note: This is a basic FRP bypass method. Effectiveness varies by Android version and manufacturer. Modern devices (Android 8+) may require alternative methods. Always verify device compatibility before execution.
